# Play With Data Type

### Task

Fix problems in this code without editing values to get output and delete unnecessary keywords.

### Provided Code 

```cpp
// Edit Anything Except Values
unsigned int a = 100;
unsigned int b = -100;
short c = 100;
long d = 500.55;

// Do Not Edit
cout << a << "\n"; // 100
cout << b << "\n"; // -100
cout << c << "\n"; // 100
cout << d << "\n"; // 500.55
```
